select c.id,c.case_number,c.product_id,p.product_name,c.function_id,f.function_name,c.level,c.img_path,c.precondition,c.title,c.exc_step, c.Exp_results,c.remarks,c.status,c.apitest_caseid,c.unittest_caseid,c.uitest_caseid,c.backdev_id,c.relate_demand,c.frontdev_id, c.productman_id,c.modified_time ,c.modifier_id from (( select id,case_number,product_id,function_id,`level`,img_path,precondition,title,exc_step,Exp_results, remarks,status,apitest_caseid,unittest_caseid,uitest_caseid,backdev_id,relate_demand,frontdev_id,productman_id,modified_time,modifier_id from tp_case_casedetail
id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) c left join tp_case_product p on c.product_id = p.id) left join tp_case_function f on c.function_id = f.id
